Description:
Now that's a view!
Spectacular panoramic views from Geelong through to the You Yangs & offering water views of Corio Bay shipping channel is this superbly built tri-level family home.
This is a showcase residence for those who like to entertain.
Upper level boasts an open plan kitchen, living & dining area with sliding glass doors opening out to the balcony.
The master bedroom opens out to its own alfresco deck with water views.
With four bedrooms there is plenty of room for a large family or would be a great holiday house for AirBNB.
A high vaulted ceiling in the family lounge.
Drive through double garage.
Large block of land of 635 sqm currently designed for a low maintenance lifestyle.
Insights: 2-4 Bayvista Parade, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Park the car and walk.
Set in a block of four, this immaculate, well looked after rear unit is all about privacy and comfort. It is ideally located within walking distance to shops and local amenities and features two generous bedrooms both with built in robes and a reverse cycle split system in the Master for year round comfort. A large kitchen with stainless steel appliances leads to an open plan living and dining flowing to a north facing low maintenance courtyard. The single garage has internal access to the laundry and a separate side access to the rear of the property. This delightful property has ducted heating, reverse cycle cooling and plenty of storage. Park the car and walk everywhere.
Insights: 4/29 Clifton Springs Road, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 9 other 2 bedroom unit in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
EXCEPTIONAL FAMILY LIVING
Elegance, comfort and exceptional functionality come to the fore in this magnificent 5 bedroom home. This immaculate striking and stylish family home ticks all the boxes. You can wait a long time to find a family home that compliments a relaxed living experience the way this property does. Lifestyle and space are on offer at this residence, combined with the close proximity to secondary and primary schools, a local shopping centre, golf course and much more. What an entrance! From the moment you enter this property you feel like you're walking into a prize home. This truly intuitive floorplan allows space to flow seamlessly with each room. This home is blessed with large rooms throughout. It boasts 5 bedrooms, 3 with walk-in robes and 2 with built in robes, 2 bathrooms and 3 toilets, a spa bath, ducted vacuum, Tasmanian oak flooring and ducted cooling/heating throughout the house. There are two separate living zones for upstairs and downstairs and all windows are tinted and laminated. A fully equipped kitchen with a large island bench. Towards the front you will find a separate home office space that can double up as a formal dining area. A super functional laundry with an abundance of storage. The back area contains a spacious rumpus/family room, perfect for family and guests to enjoy the functionality of the home. Upstairs the extensive living continues with the naturally lit open rumpus room, with a further 4 bedrooms enhanced by two walk-in robes and 2 built-in robes,a good size bathroom featuring double basins. Externally there is an undercover alfresco area perfect for entertaining guests and family. A double remote garage with drive through access to another double garage is located at the rear of the property. Every element has been finished to the highest standard. This is an exceptional opportunity and the decision to purchase this magnificent property will indeed be the easiest choice of all. Make one excellent decision today and be spoilt for choice for many years to come. Don't miss out on the lifestyle that awaits you.
Insights: 9 Macauley Way, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 2 other 5 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect Family Home in Quiet Position!
Live the convenient lifestyle in the heart of Drysdale with room to enjoy.
This immaculately presented three bedroom home ready to move straight into, located beside timbered open space to walk the dog and enjoy the views over the valley.
Only minutes from the shopping precinct, offering cafes, shops, and the supermarket also not forgetting the local hotel and jetty.
Set on a large block of approximately 740 sqm this low maintenance home will appeal to many from young families, first homebuyers and investors to name a few seeking a start in the growing Drysdale Market.
Spacious formal lounge is ideally positioned overlooking the veranda and un obscured views.
Fully modern equipped kitchen with ample cupboard space, pantry and breakfast bench with meals area, overlooks the light filled open plan living space. Leading out to the large paved entertaining area in the secured back yard, connected to the rear access of the fully lined double garage giving more than just car space.
Bedrooms are of generous size with built in robes all accompanied with ceiling fans and TV points serviced with a modern family central bathroom.
Master bedroom is complete with walk in robe and offers with a spacious ensuite.
Don't forget the study equipped with a data point or make it the fourth bedroom, other great features on offer are gas central heating, split system air conditioning, windows are accompanied with both privacy and block out blinds.
Saving in some eyes the best, the large easy care yard suitable for the tradesperson shed with side access and boat storage.
Insights: 43 Newcombe Street, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 22 other 3 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
MOTIVATED VENDOR - MUST BE SOLD!
Blink and you'll miss this unpolished gem located conveniently to Drysdale's best schools, multiple shopping centres, and parklands.
This property would be the ideal first home or investment for those wanting to buy into a popular location where growth is guaranteed!
Offering three bedrooms, two with built in robes and a central bathroom with separate toilet and laundry. A functional kitchen with an electric stove adjoins a meals area. A formal lounge room enjoys the comforts of gas heating and air conditioning. Featuring a second living area, making it the ideal spot to sit and read a book while enjoying direct access to the rear yard.
Other features include; Single Lock Up Garage/ Workshop all on a generous 647m2 allotment.
Located a short walk from local schools and close to local shops, parks and public transport, you will be hard pressed to find better value in a better location.

Description:
ENTERTAINER RIGHT HERE
This immaculate home makes sure everyone can be a part of what's going on. Open plan provides good visibility inside and out. Clever layout with centralised living area opening up onto a spacious undercover entertainment Al Fresco. This family needs a bigger home as their family grows, could be just what you're looking for. In a quiet location but close to all amenities. You can hear the Bellarine Historical Steam Train blow its whistle on weekends and holidays and only a very short walk to watch it go by. Why not choose Drysdale for your next place to live? It lacks nothing to enjoy life's journey. Need schools for children? Then we can offer the choice of four Primary and three High Schools. Need Bowling or Golf Clubs we have two local courses for each. Need to take your boat out fishing we have a newly restored Boat ramp with room for many boats. Need I say more? Have not covered what you are looking for? Then ring me for a full run down of what Drysdale has to offer.
Insights: 11 Buick Mews, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 22 other 3 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Country Life With Coastal Convenience
Picture waking up to a glorious sunrise over the rolling hills of Drysdale, Clifton Springs and beyond, coffee in hand you take a seat on the wide verandah wondering how you lived any other way! With a superb hilltop position, this delightful property provides an outstanding lifestyle opportunity not to be missed, with the convenience of town and premier schooling only 5 minutes away.
-Original homestead with large addition, set on 11 Acres (approx.) 5 mins from Drysdale village
-The well-zoned family floorplan provides options for teenagers or possible B&B potential
-External and internal finishes incorporate recycled materials adding traditional character
-Entry to the property is down a long cypress-lined driveway, accessed by automatic gates
-A wide verandah wraps the north and west elevations for a quintessential country feel
-Upon entry, a large formal living space overlooks the north facing pool and farm boundary
-High ornate ceilings with large picture and bay windows inviting gorgeous views inside
-A recycled brick open fireplace in the living is a great spot to gather on a cold winter's night
-Open plan kitchen and living zones enjoy countryside views, framed by large timber windows
-Big enough to host any occasion, entertaining flows easily out to the pool or covered verandah
-Warm Tasmanian Oak lines the kitchen with large breakfast bar, an inviting and social space
-A large corner pantry, 900mm ss gas cooker, and new dishwasher cater well to family life
-Tucked away in the original northern wing the master suite includes WIR and updated ensuite
-Feature and bay windows invite the light in by day showcasing the stars and sky by night
-Study or nursery, large laundry with extra shower and loads of storage are a great asset
-The large eastern bedroom wing is the perfect teenage retreat and has excellent B&B potential
-Queen sized bedrooms open out to the covered verandah, and have direct access to the pool
-A spacious rumpus at the end of the hall affords children their own space and has garage access
-The traditional bathroom and separate WC are central to bedrooms, and also handy for visitors
-Take a dip in the solar heated salt chlorinated pool, that enjoys all year sun with a northerly aspect
-Electric home heating and split system A/C, open fireplace as well as gas points to rumpus and living
-Remote DLUG with internal access to rumpus, plus a versatile verandah or double carport
-2 fenced yards, and 4 paddocks as well as huge raised garden beds for a self-sufficient lifestyle
-Large shed with high clearance for ‘toys' and caravans, and additional hay shed
-Equine enthusiasts will love the secure stables at the other end of the shed, and 20x50m arena
-On a clear day on your ride, you can see out to Geelong and across the bay to Williamstown!
-A total of 90,000L(approx) rainwater storage for drinking and home use that never runs low
-32,500L shed roof water harvesting for stock, with autofill systems for paddock troughs
-Just 5 minutes to every family convenience in Drysdale, and the Bellarine's best schools
-10 minutes to surf and bay beaches, wineries and the Portarlington ferry to Docklands
This premium location strikes the perfect balance of a peaceful country lifestyle, with all the convenience required for a modern family. Be the first to inspect, this property will not last!
**PLEASE NOTE** This property is accessed via Drakes Road, not Whitcombes Road. The entry to the property is located on the corner of Drakes Road and Founds Road, Drysdale.

Description:
PERFECT VILLA, WALK TO THE VILLAGE , AS NEW !
This villa still sparkles, so well designed in one of the best spots in Drysdale.....a gem will not last. Open plan living with well designed kitchen and dining. Three bedrooms, master with ensuite and BIR, other two have BIR'S, central bathroom and laundry. Features include central heating, split system, quality fittings, dishwasher, pantry and good storage. The living area opens to undercover alfresco space , easy to entertain in and out . Double garage with large access to the patio . Forget the car , you can walk to the village , enjoy the parklands and all amenities. Hassel free living.

Description:
LOCATION AND ONE OF DRYSDALE'S BEST
Constructed by one of Geelong's quality builders this home exudes quality and strength, it is a property which will stand the test of time and the construction methods in this home are nothing short of exceptional with steel frame, fired bricks and period features. Looking like it was built yesterday, before you step into this magnificent home you will immediately be struck by the finish of this property. With over 20 beautifully turned feature posts and accompanying fretwork supporting the expansive verandaâ??s stretching around the home and the meticulously manicured gardens set the mood for your invitation inside.Once you enter the home you will immediately be in awe of the high ceilings, decorative rose featured cornice and matching pendant lights, the open space is inviting and filled with natural light.The flooring is something special, being constructed with Tasmanian Oak and laid in a recessed slab to give the authentic sound of walking on natural floor board yet with concrete underfloor.
The Kitchen area is spacious and practical with two pack finish and overhead cabinetry, meals and living areas adjoin creating a wonderful environment to entertain. This opens up to a fully covered alfresco area for outside dining or just relaxing.The neutral tones used in this home will compliment any furnishing or styles you bring to the property and with a large master bedroom and generous ensuite along with two other bedrooms and study/ fourth bedroom you will never be short of space for the large family or those overnight guests.Gas hot water and programmable central gas heating is yet another feature. This home sits on a generous block size 881m2 and is fenced in matching colourbond.The piece de resistance is the rear of this property backing on to the rail trail, so the kids can wave to the train, take the dog for a walk, ride their bikes or just take a leisurely walk all from your back yard. Beyond the rail line is the open rural aspect with horses and animals, enjoyed from the comfort of the dining room, all set within a 10 minute walk to Drysdales central shopping and cafe precinct. This home is an exceptional piece of real estate and certainly deserves a look, if not a second.
Insights: 14-18 Oakland Drive, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 22 other 3 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Top Shelf!
It is very fitting that this fine property is positioned in one of Central Walk's most elevated pockets as it truly is 'top shelf' in every sense! Showcasing a stunning light and bright 'feel' this quality build will feel like home from the moment you turn the key.
A free flowing floor plan is adaptable to cater for the needs of a growing family 'or' clever zoning ensures this home is perfect for the 'downsizer'. Quality features throughout; expansive stone bench tops in the kitchen and bathrooms, stainless steel appliances, Braemar ducted heating, ceiling fans in all bedrooms, split system cooling and 8.5ft (approx.) ceiling height throughout stamp this property 'quality'.
The kitchen is undoubtedly a highlight of this fine contemporary home; modern straight lines compliment a truly practical working space; expansive benchtops and great storage solutions further endorse the kitchens user friendly design.
The central hub of the property is the kitchen/family/meals. Open plan by design it offers lovely night light and a welcoming space for the entire family. A glass sliding door provides a lovely connection to the generous rear yard and provide peace of mind as the kids play within eye view. A second living area is a generous space and provides further flexibility to the floor plan.
A generous master bedroom takes full advantage of a lovely northerly orientation, a trio of floor to ceiling windows provide an abundance of natural light. A walk in robe and a well appointed ensuite completes the picture. All 3 additional bedrooms have built in robes.
A double remote controlled garage has internal access. Low maintenance gardens, secure fencing and side pedestrian access ensure this property ticks all the boxes.
Set within the highly regarded Central Walk Estate. Beautiful parks and wetlands provide a lovely family friendly setting. Walking distance to schools and various local amenities ensures this property is a must 'view'.

Description:
Unique Land Opportunity
Conveniently set back from Princess Street, in an idyllic setting moments from the centre of town, this 950m2 (approx) allotment offers a sensational opportunity to design and build your own home in a pretty, country-esque location.
Offering a large north aspect, allowing you to take advantage of year round solar benefits, combined with beautiful established gum trees creating privacy from few surrounding neighbours, you will be impressed with the gifted natural ambience of this locale.
Enjoy being a short stroll from the town centre, benefiting from access to all family-friendly town amenities, public transport, The Bellarine Rail Trail and a myriad of social and sporting facilities.
This is a fantastic opportunity to purchase a uniquely large allotment within an already established area - enquire today!
- 950m2 flat allotment within direct walking distance to the town centre and all amenities
- Surrounded by established homes and mature gum trees, gifting a natural ambience
- Large north frontage, allowing you to take advantage of passive solar benefits (STCA)
- Convenient access to The Bellarine Rail Trail, linking you to the entire Bellarine Peninsula
- Enjoy the benefits of close proximity to award winning wineries and local produce
- Future access to the Drysdale Bypass for easy commuting

Description:
HISTORIC HOME PREMIUM LOCATION
Let me tell you a little history about this lovely home. Built by a Publican in 1904 who must have wanted to be close to the pub. Later sold to the Education Department and became the Headmasters home for many years. The current owners purchased it from the Education Department about thirty years ago and set about making it their family home. With a Heritage D overlay the front facade cannot be changed or the home knocked down.
So much character with big rooms and high ceilings fitting with the age of the era. Good sized country style kitchen with Falcon oven. Clear view of the backyard. Floors are Queensland spotted gum and there is a new log fire to enjoy sitting by when the weather is cold outside. If you are energy conscious the home is now fitted with LED lights. Visitors or family can be accommodated in a unit that is fitted with a toilet and shower plus a small kitchenette. Or you may like to use this as the fourth Bedroom/Study. Located in a dead end street right in the heart of the Drysdale Township you could not get much closer to the amenities required. Surrounded by historic buildings Drysdale is a historic town established in the late 1840â??s. With a railway line that went from South Geelong to Queenscliff with a stop at Drysdale. Today this station is tourist attraction with steam trains running between Drysdale and Queenscliff on a weekly basis. Check out the link: www.bellarinerailway.com.au/events. I have made Drysdale my town since 1987 and love what it has to offer. Why not come check out my town; you might choose to make it yours.
Insights: 11 Princess Street, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 22 other 3 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Space, comfort, style - and fun
From its set-back frontage, with mature Ornamental Pear trees providing beauty and privacy, this delightful family home combines a unique floorplan with a wonderful sense of living space and understated luxury. Located in a quiet, family-friendly street in Drysdale, a driveway leads to a double lock-up garage beside an elevated front door and return verandah. A central passage of polished spotted gum immediately draws the eye to the appealing open-plan living area in the home’s centre, while the master bedroom boasts a generous walk-in robe and a super ensuite with twin showers and basins - plus a separate WC. Further down the passage, the entertainment begins with a sunken lounge that features concertina doors, a gas log fire and the perfect setup for relaxed TV and movie viewing. Opposite is an office that could easily be an extra bedroom. The kitchen/dining/lounge is large and light and airy, with sliding doors opening onto a big, north-facing, covered deck that provides another exciting dining/entertainment option. If you’re handy in the cooking department, you’ll love the kitchen. A clever serving bench has storage on both sides and doubles as a breakfast bar, while the walk-in pantry provides a further food preparation facility. There’s an Omega electric oven with a five-burner gas cooktop and a Smeg rangehood, as well as a two-drawer Fisher and Paykel dishwasher. The adjacent laundry has outside access, with a clothesline in the back garden. Two more bedrooms share the smart bathroom which offers a frameless glass shower and spa-bath, plus separate vanity and WC. Yet another lounge/entertainment area opens onto the back garden with its built-up garden beds and native flora. Year-round comfort is guaranteed with ducted gas heating and split-systems - with shops and a school within easy walking distance.

Description:
Central Charm!
The Facts:
- Charming custom built residence stamped with quality finishes throughout (stunning timber floors)
- Set within a wonderfully central location (536m approximate land holding)
- 3 generously sized bedrooms (master complete with ensuite and walk in robe) and a study
- Beautifully appointed kitchen, expansive caesar stone bench tops, custom cabinetry and stainless steel appliances
- Landscaped front gardens, exposed aggregate driveway and courtyard
- Remote controlled double garage
The Features:
This beautifully appointed custom build will excite a buyer who is looking for a property with 'top shelf' finishes. An impressive streetscape boasting a charming weatherboard appearance, an exposed aggregate driveway, landscaped gardens and hardwood decking sets a theme of true quality. Upon entry you will be greeted by stunning timber floors, lovely high ceilings and a gentle cascading floor plan. The kitchen/family/meals zone is simply one of the finest in today's property market, a lovely open design boasts lovely natural light, designer window furnishings and dual glass sliding doors provide a lovely seamless connection to an expansive decked entertaining area. The cleverly designed kitchen is not only eye catching but also nails the brief for practicalities with an expansive caesar stone bench top taking centre stage, custom cabinetry offering a press touch design and a walk in pantry and stainless steel appliances. A remote controlled double garage and internal access further endorses this properties user friendly design. This stunning property is set within one of Drysdale's most sought after pockets; central conveniences are complemented by a beautiful 'green and leafy' streetscape.
Call today to secure what is undoubtedly a property that will be in high demand in the local property market.

Description:
Comfort in the heart of town
Genuine selling range of $455,000 to $485,000
Live a convenient lifestyle in the heart of Drysdale. This gorgeous three bedroom home superbly located across the road from the iconic Drysdale Recreation Reserve offering social tennis, netball, cricket and football with the added bonus of a beautiful parkland to walk the dog around the McLeod Waterholes.
Set on a spacious block of approx 475sqm, this low maintenance home will appeal to young families, investors and first home buyers seeking a start in the desirable growing Drysdale market.
Three king sized bedrooms, with walk in robes.
Large central bathroom.
The master bedroom is generous, offers with a spacious ensuite.
Fully equipped kitchen with ample cupboard and bench space, meals area & walk in pantry.
Spacious formal lounge complete with gas heater, and split system air conditioner.
The lounge is ideally positioned overlooking the verandah outdoor space - perfect for entertaining.
The garden oasis will spark the interest of budding green thumbs, with it's clever easy-care design.
A sealed pathway to the Drysdale Village shopping precinct, offering cafes, shops, supermarkets, medical practices & public transport, this is one not to miss!

Description:
A Place to Call Home
Warm and inviting are just a few words that come to mind when describing 50 Newcombe Street, Drysdale; feel completely at home in this private and charming abode.
This extremely well-kept 12 year old Geelong Home will exceed your expectations; you will find that all you need is offered in such a tidy and complete package.
Comprising 3 bedrooms with the master at the fore of the home enjoying a relaxing outlook including a walk-in robe, full ensuite and ceiling fan with the remaining 2 bedrooms equipped with built-in robes. A generous sized laundry with bench space and ample cupboards including yard access, separate toilet and main bathroom including bath and shower complete this wing of the house; the hub of the home is very cozy and open plan with the kitchen overlooking meals and living. The kitchen includes a gas stove top, dishwasher, microwave provision and a lovely garden outlook. With access onto the large decked undercover area you are set for entertaining year round with a low maintenance garden that wraps around the home, a fantastic fencing system has been put into place which is ideal for dogs/animals and children to play securely and separately if need be.
Features of the home include ducted heating, split system heating/cooling (6 months old), NBN ready, Foxtel ready, garden shed, double lock up garage with rear access onto a purpose built bay where the current owners accommodate a boat but can be used for trailers, bikes or another area.
This inviting retreat offers a great deal of privacy and security but is conveniently located walking distance to the Drysdale Township where all your amenities are at your fingertips.
This home is a true charmer that has been well and truly loved and looked after over the last years.

Description:
Everything At Your Doorstep
Location location location, you can't get any closer to the shops! Sweet as apple pie this 2 bedroom unit is the perfect down sizer. Brand new carpet & freshly painted as you step inside to a great lounge with a sky light & gas heating. This flows onto a dining area also featuring a sky light. Kitchen bench doubles as a breakfast bar with room for stools, lots of cupboards, brand new gas stove plus range hood & air conditioning. Central bathroom has seperate shower, bath and lots of storage. Both bedrooms have built in robes. Great backyard is a rare find for a unit offering you plenty of room to enjoy gardening with a private gate to walk just a few meters across the road to Safeway. Plus a single car garage all sitting pretty in a quiet court location. With everything Central Drysdale has to offer, cafes, library, post office, public transport & medical facilities all just a short stroll away, you can leave the car at home.
Insights: 2/10 Diana Court, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 9 other 2 bedroom unit in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Not Just Another Unit
Positioned at the rear of an immaculate, established block of units on a large plot of approximately 434m2. You will not have to give up the garden as this unit has a lovely expanse of outdoor area complete with a garden shed. The piece de resistance is the Drysdale Recreation Reserve situated at your back door. Wake every more to a chorus from the local Magpie group.
Comprising two spacious bedrooms with triple BIRs. There is a third bedroom - sitting room off the lounge area. The lounge is perfectly positioned with access to the garden area which has a northerly aspect and as the seasons change snuggle up near the cosy gas log fire.
The kitchen dining area is spacious with loads of cupboard space and dishwasher and provides access to the rear garden. A single car garage with remote and plenty of parking space. These units are in great demand in today's market so do not waste time booking your inspection
Insights: 9/53-55 Wyndham Street, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 22 other 3 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.
